title: SPO-14582: Data Analysis
text:
Overview
SPO-14582: Data Analysis is a seminar offered in the M.Sc. Sport Science for Health at the University of Konstanz. It provides an introduction to data analysis using the statistical programming software R. Students will learn the basics of R programming and how to use R for various common data analysis tasks.
